explains: adj. 重要的，有益的，值得做的

sentences.en: The smile on her face made it all worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的笑容使得这一切都非常值得。

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to include really high-quality illustrations.
sentences.cn: 把真正高质量的插图包括进去是值得的。

sentences.en: The president's trip to Washington this week seems to have been worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 该总统本周的华盛顿之行似乎是值得的。
